backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining HEV suit backend with types for stats, modules, hazards, life support, power management, and AI communication; manages suit state, environmental hazards, and system status with query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: female TTS voice narration for boot sequence and enhanced boot sequence visuals with status indicators and progress bars.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, including App, HUD layout, tabs (Basics, Medical, Info, Utilities, Weapons, Settings), boot sequence, state stores (Zustand), and audio systems.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, borders, and HUD-specific design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, manifest link, and icons for H.E.V Mark V Prototype HUD application.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, display mode (standalone), theme colors, and orientation settings for H.E.V HUD progressive web app.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for app shell resources with offline fallback and automatic cache cleanup on activation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating boot sequence, display mode routing (MINIMAL/TACTICAL), tab management, backend module state synchronization to Zustand, service worker registration, and HUD tab navigation with audio feedback.
frontend/src/audio/audioBus.ts: Central audio bus managing AudioContext, SpeechSynthesis for HEV boot sequence narration with female voice selection, and methods for playing UI sound effects and voice clips with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/audio/hevVoice.ts: Helper functions for triggering HEV-style voice announcements (module enabled/disabled, health critical, hazard detected, etc.) that check voice settings before playing audio files via audioBus.
frontend/src/audio/uiSfx.ts: UI sound effect helpers for common interactions (tab switch, toggle, console submit, button clicks) that check voice settings before playing audio via audioBus.
frontend/src/components/audio/AmbiencePl: Audio player component with playback controls (play/pause/skip), volume slider, loop toggle, and custom track upload functionality using audioState store.
frontend/src/components/boot/BootSequenc: Boot sequence overlay component that displays progressive system initialization stages with CRT effects, plays boot sounds, triggers optional voice narration, and fades out on completion.
frontend/src/components/common/HudSwitch: Wrapper component for Switch UI element with HUD-specific styling and standard switch props (checked, disabled, onChange).
frontend/src/components/hazards/Environm: Panel displaying five environmental hazard types (fire, bio, radiation, electrical, gas) with icons, levels, and status classes (nominal/warning/critical) from hazardsState.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudGlobalEff: Renders non-interactive visual effect overlays (bloom, critical flash, presence glow) with reduced motion support for accessibility.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudLayout.ts: Main HUD container component managing layout, color schemes, landscape/compact modes, UI scaling, CRT/scanline overlays, header/footer with branding, and global effects integration.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudOfflineOv: Overlay component displaying a warning message when HUD system is disabled, prompting user to restore HUD status in INFO tab.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudTabsBar.t: Renders a tabbed navigation bar for the HUD with tabs for Basics, Medical, Info, Utilities, Weapons, Hazards, Tactical, and Settings. Each tab displays real-time status indicators (health, armor, active modules, hazard levels, etc.) pulled from various state stores.
frontend/src/components/hud/MinimalHudVi: Displays a minimal HUD view showing only essential stats (health, armor, aux power, ammo) in a grid layout with a button to restore the full standard HUD display.
frontend/src/components/hud/Panels.tsx: Provides reusable panel components (HudPanel, StatPanel, MeterPanel, VitalsPanel) for displaying labeled stats with progress bars and status indicators (nominal/warning/critical).
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalHudS: Wraps content in a tactical HUD layout with top/bottom bars and left/right sidebars displaying combat system status, threat analysis, heart rate, targeting info, and compact stat panels.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalOver: Renders a full-screen tactical overlay with corner frames, center reticle, and multiple readout panels showing combat mode, threat level, targeting, heart rate, enemy locator, and other militarized system statuses.
frontend/src/components/info/CommandCons: Implements an interactive command console with input field, command history, arrow key navigation, and execution of commands via executeCommand function with audio feedback.
frontend/src/components/info/ConfirmActi: Displays a confirmation dialog modal with customizable title, description, and confirm/cancel actions that trigger audio feedback on user interaction.
frontend/src/components/info/OperatorPro: Shows operator profile information including name (Leon Krywiak), clearance level, suit serial number, neural link status, biometric verification, and current mission time.
frontend/src/components/info/SuitSubsyst: Displays life support, environmental protection, and power systems with interactive toggles for voice, radio, HUD, and display modes; includes confirmation modals for critical actions.
frontend/src/components/info/SystemLogVi: Renders a scrollable system log displaying timestamped entries with type-based styling (system, warning, error).
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalD: Displays a schematic H.E.V. suit diagram with color-coded overlays for head, torso, and arms based on health and armor values.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalI: Provides interactive medical panels including limb integrity, emergency SOS, neural interface status, and toggleable advanced medical systems (pain suppression, auto-stim, nano-repair).
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalR: Displays vital signs (heart rate, blood pressure, respiration) and trauma assessment metrics derived from suit health, armor, and hazard levels.
frontend/src/components/medical/panels/E: Emergency SOS panel with arming system, signal spoofing toggle, test burst transmission, and status monitoring for distress beacon.
frontend/src/components/medical/panels/L: Monitors individual limb integrity, servo load, fracture probability, and calibration status with toggleable calibration controls for each limb.
frontend/src/components/tactical/RadarPa: React component that renders an animated radar display on a canvas, showing friendly/hostile/unknown contacts with a sweeping scan line and range rings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that manages the ICP actor instance with authentication, creating actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoUiScale.ts: Hook that calculates and returns a responsive UI scale factor based on viewport dimensions, interpolating between min and max scales for mobile and tablet screens.
frontend/src/hooks/useHudPresence.ts: Hook that tracks pointer/touch position and updates CSS custom properties (--pointer-x, --pointer-y, --pointer-intensity) using requestAnimationFrame for performance-optimized reactive effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching stats and module states from the backend actor, plus mutations for updating stats and toggling modules with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Hook that detects and returns the user's prefers-reduced-motion media query preference for accessibility-aware animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewportOrientatio: Hook that detects and returns whether the device is in landscape orientation using matchMedia and resize/orientationchange events.
frontend/src/index.css: Main stylesheet defining Tailwind layers, OKLCH color system with orange/red palette, CRT overlay effects, scanlines, and compact HUD panel styling for a retro sci-fi interface.
frontend/src/lib/commands.ts: Command-line interface implementation for controlling suit stats, hazards, modules, and system settings via slash commands like /health, /armor, /hazard, and /module.
frontend/src/lib/glyphs.ts: Exports Unicode text-variant symbols for hazards (fire, bio, radiation, electrical, gas) and status indicators to ensure monochrome HUD-safe rendering.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker for PWA functionality on window load if supported by the browser.
frontend/src/state/audioState.ts: Zustand store managing audio playlist, playback controls (play/pause/next/previous), volume, loop mode, and custom track uploads with default ambience tracks.
frontend/src/state/hazardAlerts.ts: Monitors hazard levels and triggers critical flashing alerts with throttled voice warnings when any hazard exceeds 80%.
frontend/src/state/hazardsState.ts: Zustand store tracking five environmental hazard types (fire, bio, radiation, electrical, gas) with aggregate calculation and status determination.
frontend/src/state/infoSettingsState.ts: Zustand store for UI settings including voice toggle, display mode, radio link, HUD color scheme, UI scale, and tactical mode preferences.
frontend/src/state/suitState.ts: Zustand store managing suit statistics (health, armor, aux, ammo, hazard) and module activation states with validation and reset functionality.
frontend/src/state/systemLog.ts: Zustand store for system log entries with typed messages (system, module, command, warning, error, hazard) and timestamps.
frontend/src/state/uiState.ts: Zustand store managing landscape mode toggle state for UI layout adaptation.
frontend/src/state/weaponSystemsState.ts: Zustand store tracking selected weapon, ammo type, and fire rate with default crowbar/melee configuration.
frontend/src/tabs/BasicsTab.tsx: Renders the Basics tab with core statistics panel (health, armor, aux, ammo), environmental hazards panel, and vitals panel with status thresholds.
frontend/src/tabs/HazardsTab.tsx: Displays environmental hazard monitoring with expandable panels for fire, bio, radiation, electrical, and gas hazards, including trend indicators, statistics, and atmospheric readouts.
frontend/src/tabs/InfoTab.tsx: Renders the info tab layout with operator profile, suit subsystem readouts, system log view, and command console components.
frontend/src/tabs/MedicalTab.tsx: Displays medical monitoring interface with medical readouts and interactive panels for health management.
frontend/src/tabs/SettingsTab.tsx: Provides settings controls for voice, display mode, HUD, color scheme, UI scale, and system reset with audio feedback integration.
frontend/src/tabs/TacticalTab.tsx: Shows tactical information including radar panel, combat readouts (heart rate, threat level), and contact list with friendly/hostile indicators.
frontend/src/tabs/UtilitiesTab.tsx: Manages suit module toggles (helmet, respirator, flashlight, etc.) with backend integration and includes an ambience audio player.
frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx: Displays detailed weapon information with selectable ammo types and fire rates, showing capabilities, lore, and tactical use cases for each weapon.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors using OKLCH color space, border utilities, tactical letter spacing, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file for H.E.V Mark Prototype protective systems interface tracking two completed features: female text-to-speech voice narration for boot sequence and enhanced visual boot sequence with system initialization stages. Contains architectural notes about TTS voice system and multi-stage boot visualization.
